synopsis.text:
Hiroyasu Ishida, a talented animation student from Kyoto Seika University's renowned Faculty of Manga, presents his latest animated short film, Rain Town. After achieving global recognition with his Fumiko no Kokuhaku anime short, Ishida spent two years developing this project alongside fellow student Yoshida Shougo as their graduation endeavor.

In a quaint, seemingly forsaken town perpetually drenched in rain, a young girl's life takes an unexpected turn. One stormy evening, she stumbles upon an extraordinary new companion â€“ a robot. This serendipitous meeting triggers a cascade of memories and orchestrates a heartwarming reunion between the robot and a girl who has forever remained etched in its memory. Prepare to embark on a captivating journey filled with nostalgia, curiosity, and unforgettable friendships.
